title: Memperkenalkan Diri
description: Percakapan dasar untuk memperkenalkan diri

dialog.speaker: John
dialog.english: Hello, my name is John. What's your name?
dialog.indonesian: Halo, nama saya John. Siapa nama Anda?

dialog.speaker: Lisa
dialog.english: Hi John, I'm Lisa. Nice to meet you.
dialog.indonesian: Hai John, saya Lisa. Senang bertemu denganmu.

dialog.speaker: John
dialog.english: Nice to meet you too, Lisa. Where are you from?
dialog.indonesian: Senang bertemu denganmu juga, Lisa. Kamu dari mana?

dialog.speaker: Lisa
dialog.english: I'm from Jakarta, Indonesia. How about you?
dialog.indonesian: Saya dari Jakarta, Indonesia. Bagaimana denganmu?

dialog.speaker: John
dialog.english: I'm from London, England. Are you here for vacation?
dialog.indonesian: Saya dari London, Inggris. Apakah kamu di sini untuk berlibur?

title: Belanja di Toko
description: Percakapan saat berbelanja di toko

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Excuse me, how much is this shirt?
dialog.indonesian: Permisi, berapa harga kemeja ini?

dialog.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialog.english: It's $25. Would you like to try it on?
dialog.indonesian: Harganya $25. Apakah Anda ingin mencobanya?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Yes, please. Where is the fitting room?
dialog.indonesian: Ya, tolong. Di mana ruang ganti?

dialog.speaker: Shopkeeper
dialog.english: It's over there, on your right.
dialog.indonesian: Ada di sebelah sana, di sebelah kanan Anda.

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Thank you. I'll take this one.
dialog.indonesian: Terima kasih. Saya akan mengambil yang ini.

title: Memesan Makanan
description: Percakapan di restoran saat memesan makanan

dialog.speaker: Waiter
dialog.english: Good evening. Are you ready to order?
dialog.indonesian: Selamat malam. Apakah Anda siap memesan?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Yes, I'd like the grilled salmon with vegetables, please.
dialog.indonesian: Ya, saya ingin salmon panggang dengan sayuran.

dialog.speaker: Waiter
dialog.english: How would you like your salmon cooked?
dialog.indonesian: Bagaimana tingkat kematangan salmon yang Anda inginkan?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Medium, please. And could I get a glass of red wine?
dialog.indonesian: Medium saja. Dan bisakah saya dapatkan segelas anggur merah?

title: Bertanya Arah
description: Percakapan saat bertanya arah di jalan

dialog.speaker: Tourist
dialog.english: Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the museum?
dialog.indonesian: Permisi, bisakah Anda memberi tahu saya bagaimana cara ke museum?

dialog.speaker: Local
dialog.english: Sure, it's about two blocks from here. Go straight and turn left at the traffic light.
dialog.indonesian: Tentu, sekitar dua blok dari sini. Jalan lurus dan belok kiri di lampu lalu lintas.

dialog.speaker: Tourist
dialog.english: Is it within walking distance?
dialog.indonesian: Apakah bisa dicapai dengan berjalan kaki?

dialog.speaker: Local
dialog.english: Yes, it's about a 10-minute walk. You can't miss it - it's a big white building.
dialog.indonesian: Ya, sekitar 10 menit berjalan kaki. Anda tidak akan melewatkannya - itu gedung putih yang besar.

title: Memesan Taksi
description: Percakapan saat memesan taksi melalui telepon

dialog.speaker: Caller
dialog.english: Hello, I'd like to book a taxi, please.
dialog.indonesian: Halo, saya ingin memesan taksi.

dialog.speaker: Operator
dialog.english: Certainly. What's your pickup address?
dialog.indonesian: Tentu. Apa alamat penjemputan Anda?

dialog.speaker: Caller
dialog.english: 123 Main Street, in front of the post office.
dialog.indonesian: 123 Jalan Utama, di depan kantor pos.

dialog.speaker: Operator
dialog.english: And your destination?
dialog.indonesian: Dan tujuan Anda?

dialog.speaker: Caller
dialog.english: Central Station, please. How long will the taxi take?
dialog.indonesian: Stasiun Pusat. Berapa lama taksi akan tiba?

title: Check-in Hotel
description: Percakapan saat check-in di hotel

dialog.speaker: Guest
dialog.english: Good afternoon, I have a reservation under the name Smith.
dialog.indonesian: Selamat siang, saya memiliki reservasi atas nama Smith.

dialog.speaker: Receptionist
dialog.english: Welcome, Mr. Smith. Let me check... Yes, we have your reservation for two nights.
dialog.indonesian: Selamat datang, Tuan Smith. Mari saya periksa... Ya, kami memiliki reservasi Anda untuk dua malam.

dialog.speaker: Guest
dialog.english: Could I get a room with a city view if possible?
dialog.indonesian: Bisakah saya mendapatkan kamar dengan pemandangan kota jika memungkinkan?

dialog.speaker: Receptionist
dialog.english: Certainly, I can give you a room on the 8th floor with a nice view. Here's your key card.
dialog.indonesian: Tentu, saya bisa memberikan Anda kamar di lantai 8 dengan pemandangan yang bagus. Ini kartu kunci Anda.

title: Konsultasi Dokter
description: Percakapan dengan dokter di klinik

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.english: What seems to be the problem?
dialog.indonesian: Apa keluhan Anda?

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.english: I've had a fever and sore throat for three days now.
dialog.indonesian: Saya mengalami demam dan sakit tenggorokan selama tiga hari.

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.english: Let me examine you. Please open your mouth and say 'ah'.
dialog.indonesian: Biar saya periksa. Tolong buka mulut dan bilang 'ah'.

dialog.speaker: Patient
dialog.english: Ah... Is it serious, doctor?
dialog.indonesian: Ah... Apakah ini serius, dok?

dialog.speaker: Doctor
dialog.english: It's just a viral infection. I'll prescribe some medicine for the symptoms.
dialog.indonesian: Ini hanya infeksi virus. Saya akan meresepkan obat untuk gejalanya.

title: Meminjam Buku
description: Percakapan di perpustakaan saat meminjam buku

dialog.speaker: Librarian
dialog.english: How can I help you today?
dialog.indonesian: Ada yang bisa saya bantu hari ini?

dialog.speaker: Student
dialog.english: I'd like to borrow this book about Indonesian history.
dialog.indonesian: Saya ingin meminjam buku tentang sejarah Indonesia ini.

dialog.speaker: Librarian
dialog.english: Do you have your library card with you?
dialog.indonesian: Apakah Anda membawa kartu perpustakaan?

dialog.speaker: Student
dialog.english: Yes, here it is. How long can I keep the book?
dialog.indonesian: Ya, ini. Berapa lama saya bisa meminjam buku ini?

dialog.speaker: Librarian
dialog.english: The loan period is two weeks. You can renew it online if needed.
dialog.indonesian: Masa pinjam adalah dua minggu. Anda bisa memperpanjangnya secara online jika diperlukan.

title: Laporan Polisi
description: Percakapan saat melaporkan kehilangan dompet di kantor polisi

dialog.speaker: Police Officer
dialog.english: How can I assist you today?
dialog.indonesian: Apa yang bisa saya bantu hari ini?

dialog.speaker: Victim
dialog.english: I'd like to report a stolen wallet. It was taken on the bus this morning.
dialog.indonesian: Saya ingin melaporkan dompet yang dicuri. Dompet itu diambil di bus pagi ini.

dialog.speaker: Police Officer
dialog.english: Can you describe the wallet and its contents?
dialog.indonesian: Bisakah Anda mendeskripsikan dompet dan isinya?

dialog.speaker: Victim
dialog.english: It's a black leather wallet with my ID card, credit cards, and about $50 in cash.
dialog.indonesian: Dompet kulit hitam berisi kartu identitas saya, kartu kredit, dan sekitar $50 tunai.

dialog.speaker: Police Officer
dialog.english: We'll file a report. Here's your case number for reference.
dialog.indonesian: Kami akan membuat laporan. Ini nomor kasus Anda untuk referensi.

title: Wawancara Kerja
description: Percakapan dalam wawancara pekerjaan

dialog.speaker: Interviewer
dialog.english: Tell me about your previous work experience.
dialog.indonesian: Ceritakan tentang pengalaman kerja Anda sebelumnya.

dialog.speaker: Candidate
dialog.english: I worked as a sales associate for two years at ABC Company.
dialog.indonesian: Saya bekerja sebagai sales associate selama dua tahun di Perusahaan ABC.

dialog.speaker: Interviewer
dialog.english: Why are you interested in this position?
dialog.indonesian: Mengapa Anda tertarik dengan posisi ini?

dialog.speaker: Candidate
dialog.english: I'm looking for new challenges and this role aligns with my skills.
dialog.indonesian: Saya mencari tantangan baru dan peran ini sesuai dengan keahlian saya.

dialog.speaker: Interviewer
dialog.english: Where do you see yourself in five years?
dialog.indonesian: Di mana Anda melihat diri Anda dalam lima tahun?

title: Memesan Kopi di Kafe
description: Percakapan saat memesan minuman di kafe

dialog.speaker: Barista
dialog.english: Good morning! What would you like to order?
dialog.indonesian: Selamat pagi! Apa yang ingin Anda pesan?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: I'd like a medium latte with less sugar, please.
dialog.indonesian: Saya ingin latte ukuran sedang dengan sedikit gula.

dialog.speaker: Barista
dialog.english: Would you like it hot or iced?
dialog.indonesian: Anda mau yang panas atau dingin?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Hot, please. And can I also get a croissant?
dialog.indonesian: Panas. Dan bisakah saya juga dapatkan croissant?

title: Menanyakan Jadwal Kereta
description: Percakapan di stasiun kereta

dialog.speaker: Passenger
dialog.english: Excuse me, when is the next train to Bandung?
dialog.indonesian: Permisi, kapan kereta berikutnya ke Bandung?

dialog.speaker: Officer
dialog.english: The next train departs at 3:15 PM from platform 2.
dialog.indonesian: Kereta berikutnya berangkat pukul 15.15 dari peron 2.

dialog.speaker: Passenger
dialog.english: How long does the journey take?
dialog.indonesian: Berapa lama perjalanannya?

dialog.speaker: Officer
dialog.english: Approximately 3 hours. Would you like a one-way or return ticket?
dialog.indonesian: Sekitar 3 jam. Anda mau tiket sekali jalan atau pulang-pergi?

title: Mengeluhkan Masalah Internet
description: Percakapan dengan layanan pelanggan ISP

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Hello, I've been having internet connection issues since yesterday.
dialog.indonesian: Halo, saya mengalami masalah koneksi internet sejak kemarin.

dialog.speaker: Agent
dialog.english: Have you tried restarting your router?
dialog.indonesian: Sudahkah Anda mencoba menyalakan ulang router?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Yes, but it's still very slow. Sometimes it disconnects completely.
dialog.indonesian: Sudah, tapi masih lambat. Kadang terputus sama sekali.

dialog.speaker: Agent
dialog.english: I'll check the connection on our end. Please hold for a moment.
dialog.indonesian: Saya akan memeriksa koneksi dari sini. Mohon tunggu sebentar.

title: Membeli Tiket Bioskop
description: Percakapan di loket tiket bioskop

dialog.speaker: Cashier
dialog.english: Which movie would you like to watch?
dialog.indonesian: Film apa yang ingin Anda tonton?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Two tickets for 'Oppenheimer', please. The 7 PM show.
dialog.indonesian: Dua tiket untuk 'Oppenheimer', yang jam 7 malam.

dialog.speaker: Cashier
dialog.english: Would you like regular or VIP seats?
dialog.indonesian: Mau kursi regular atau VIP?

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Regular is fine. How much is it in total?
dialog.indonesian: Regular saja. Berapa total harganya?

title: Membatalkan Reservasi
description: Percakapan saat membatalkan reservasi hotel

dialog.speaker: Receptionist
dialog.english: Grand Hotel, how may I assist you?
dialog.indonesian: Grand Hotel, ada yang bisa saya bantu?

dialog.speaker: Guest
dialog.english: I'd like to cancel my reservation for next week.
dialog.indonesian: Saya ingin membatalkan reservasi saya untuk minggu depan.

dialog.speaker: Receptionist
dialog.english: May I have your booking reference number?
dialog.indonesian: Boleh saya minta nomor referensi pemesanan Anda?

dialog.speaker: Guest
dialog.english: It's GH-2024-5678. Will there be a cancellation fee?
dialog.indonesian: Nomornya GH-2024-5678. Apakah ada biaya pembatalan?

title: Meminta Rekomendasi Makanan
description: Percakapan meminta saran menu di restoran

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: What do you recommend for someone who likes spicy food?
dialog.indonesian: Apa rekomendasi Anda untuk yang suka makanan pedas?

dialog.speaker: Waiter
dialog.english: Our signature dish is 'Sambal Matah Prawns'. It's very popular!
dialog.indonesian: Menu andalan kami adalah 'Udang Sambal Matah'. Ini sangat laris!

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Is it extremely spicy? I can handle medium-level spice.
dialog.indonesian: Apakah sangat pedas? Saya bisa makan pedas level sedang.

dialog.speaker: Waiter
dialog.english: We can adjust the spice level. Would you like to try it?
dialog.indonesian: Kami bisa menyesuaikan tingkat kepedasan. Mau mencobanya?

title: Lapor Kebocoran Air
description: Percakapan melaporkan masalah pipa air ke landlord

dialog.speaker: Tenant
dialog.english: Hello, there's a water leak under the kitchen sink. It's quite bad.
dialog.indonesian: Halo, ada kebocoran air di bawah wastafel dapur. Cukup parah.

dialog.speaker: Landlord
dialog.english: When did you notice the leak?
dialog.indonesian: Kapan Anda menyadari kebocoran ini?

dialog.speaker: Tenant
dialog.english: This morning. There's already a small puddle on the floor.
dialog.indonesian: Pagi tadi. Sudah ada genangan kecil di lantai.

dialog.speaker: Landlord
dialog.english: I'll send a plumber within two hours. Please clear the area first.
dialog.indonesian: Saya akan mengirim tukang ledeng dalam dua jam. Tolong kosongkan area itu dulu.

title: Diskusi Proyek Kantor
description: Percakapan rapat tim di tempat kerja

dialog.speaker: Manager
dialog.english: Let's review the project timeline. Are we on track?
dialog.indonesian: Mari kita tinjau timeline proyek. Apakah kita sesuai jadwal?

dialog.speaker: Employee
dialog.english: The design phase is complete, but development is delayed by 3 days.
dialog.indonesian: Fase desain sudah selesai, tapi pengembangan tertunda 3 hari.

dialog.speaker: Manager
dialog.english: What's causing the delay?
dialog.indonesian: Apa penyebab keterlambatannya?

dialog.speaker: Employee
dialog.english: We encountered unexpected bugs in the payment module.
dialog.indonesian: Kami menemukan bug tak terduga di modul pembayaran.

title: Komplain Kamar Hotel
description: Percakapan saat melaporkan masalah di kamar hotel

dialog.speaker: Guest
dialog.english: The air conditioner in my room isn't working properly.
dialog.indonesian: AC di kamar saya tidak bekerja dengan baik.

dialog.speaker: Receptionist
dialog.english: I apologize for the inconvenience. Would you like us to repair it or move you to another room?
dialog.indonesian: Saya minta maaf atas ketidaknyamanannya. Anda ingin kami memperbaikinya atau memindahkan Anda ke kamar lain?

dialog.speaker: Guest
dialog.english: If possible, I'd prefer to change rooms. It's too hot in there.
dialog.indonesian: Jika memungkinkan, saya ingin pindah kamar. Terlalu panas di sana.

dialog.speaker: Receptionist
dialog.english: We have a similar room on the 5th floor. I'll arrange it immediately.
dialog.indonesian: Kami punya kamar serupa di lantai 5. Akan saya siapkan segera.

title: Tanya Harga Sewa Mobil
description: Percakapan di rental mobil

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: How much does it cost to rent a compact car for 3 days?
dialog.indonesian: Berapa biaya sewa mobil compact untuk 3 hari?

dialog.speaker: Agent
dialog.english: It's $45 per day, including insurance. Total would be $135.
dialog.indonesian: $45 per hari, termasuk asuransi. Totalnya $135.

dialog.speaker: Customer
dialog.english: Is there a discount for weekly rental?
dialog.indonesian: Ada diskon untuk sewa mingguan?

dialog.speaker: Agent
dialog.english: Yes, you get 10% off for rentals over 5 days.
dialog.indonesian: Ya, Anda dapat diskon 10% untuk sewa di atas 5 hari.
